name: Taco Crawl
description1: Full stack MERN web app that generates random restaurants that serve tacos using the Yelp API
description2: To save a crawl or individual restaurants, the user can register for an account and view their profile

name: Beer O' Slots V2
description1: Worked along with a UX-UI designer to revamp the game and made it more user friendly
description2: Wrote javascript functions to check matching images horizontally, vertically and diagonally
